name: Private Tour: Sonargaon Day Tour including Country Boat Trip
description: Enjoy visiting some of the most historically and culturally important sites in Bangladesh on this day tour to Sonargaon. Taking a tour is the easy way to see many sights in one day. Go on a boat ride on the Meghna River to witness traditional rural farming life. Your local guide will share a wealth of information with you, so your knowledge and understanding of Bangladesh will grow.
